Description: This web service retrieves information about a patient’s dental visits, such as the visit’s status and scheduling information.

ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR identifier for a RequestGroup resource.

RequestGroup.Name: RequestGroup
RequestGroup.Description: An instance of the R4 RequestGroup FHIR resource.

author.Name: author
author.Description: The user who created the dental visit.

authoredOn.Name: authoredOn
authoredOn.Description: The instant the dental visit was created.

dental-visit-number.Name: extension
dental-visit-number.Description: The relative order of the visit within the treatment.

dental-visit-requested-date.Name: extension
dental-visit-requested-date.Description: The date on which the provider requested that the appointment be scheduled.

dental-visit-requested-length.Name: extension
dental-visit-requested-length.Description: The requested appointment length for the visit.

dental-visit-requested-provider.Name: extension
dental-visit-requested-provider.Description: The requested visit provider for scheduling.

dental-visit-requested-providerType.Name: extension
dental-visit-requested-providerType.Description: The requested provider type for scheduling.

dental-visit-requested-spacing-days.Name: extension
dental-visit-requested-spacing-days.Description: The requested number of spacing, in days, between scheduled visits.

dental-visit-requested-type.Name: extension
dental-visit-requested-type.Description: The requested visit type for scheduling.

dental-visit-scheduling-instructions.Name: extension
dental-visit-scheduling-instructions.Description: The scheduling instructions for the visit.

dental-visit-scheduling-status.Name: extension
dental-visit-scheduling-status.Description: The scheduling status of the visit.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: The encounter for the dental visit.

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description: The intention for the dental visit.

ready-for-scheduling.Name: extension
ready-for-scheduling.Description: Whether the visit is ready for scheduling

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the dental visit.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient for the dental visit.
